basics.name: Adriel White
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

highlights: Provides learning assistance to students in both scheduled and drop-in tutoring
Workshops with team of tutors and staffs to expand academic opportunities to students

work.company: Robinson, Chur, and Cheng, Attorneys at Law
work.summary: Handled client intakes and organized legal documents
highlights: Respond to potential clients, gathering information and submitting it to Mr. Cheng
Systematically organized and filed important documents, handled creating new folders, scanned and copied documents when needed

volunteer.summary: Facilitator of rounds to ensure smooth operation of tournaments
highlights: Participated in a team to set up and break down tables, chess boards, and clocks for tournaments
Assisted the Head Tournament Directors by adjudicating in-round disputes

awards.title: UH Manoa Provost Scholarship
awards.summary: Competitive scholarship awarded to incoming freshmen for rigorous academics including at least a 3.7 high school GPA.
